low.question: In which year did Christopher Columbus first arrive in the Americas?
What year did the United States declare independence?
In which year did World War I begin?
Which year marks the end of World War II in Europe (VE Day)?
When was the Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen adopted during the French Revolution?
What year did the Roman Empire traditionally fall with the deposition of Romulus Augustulus?
Which year did the Berlin Wall fall, symbolizing the end of Cold War divisions?
In what year did the Magna Carta get sealed at Runnymede?
When did the American Civil War begin?
Which year marks the start of the Protestant Reformation when Martin Luther posted his 95 Theses?
In which year did Napoleon Bonaparte become Emperor of the French?
What year did the Titanic sink on its maiden voyage?
When did India gain independence from British rule?
Which year did the Russian Revolution that led to Bolshevik power occur?
In which year was the United Nations founded?
What year marks the beginning of the Renaissance often used by historians (fall of Constantinople)?
When was the first successful powered flight by the Wright brothers?
Which year did the Spanish Armada attempt to invade England?
In what year did Gandhi lead the Salt March against British salt taxes?
What year did the Black Death reach Europe, beginning its major pandemic wave?
When was the Battle of Waterloo, ending Napoleon's rule?
Which year did the Ottoman Empire capture Constantinople?
In which year did the UK pass the Act of Union creating the United Kingdom of Great Britain?
What year did Australia become a federated nation (Commonwealth of Australia)?
When did Japan formally surrender, ending World War II?
Which year did the Suez Canal open, transforming global trade routes?
In what year did the Warsaw Pact formally dissolve?
What year did the Protestant English king Henry VIII break with Rome establishing the Church of England?
When did the Moon landing of Apollo 11 occur?
Which year did the Great Fire of London occur?

medium.question: In which year did the Bolsheviks sign the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk, exiting World War I?
When was the Edict of Nantes, granting religious toleration in France, issued?
What year did the Meiji Restoration begin transforming Japan into a modern state?
In which year did the Cuban Missile Crisis bring the world close to nuclear war?
What year was the Berlin Airlift initiated in response to the Soviet blockade?
When did the Ottoman Empire officially dissolve after World War I?
Which year did the Statute of Westminster grant legislative independence to British Dominions?
In what year did Israel declare independence, leading to the 1948 Arab-Israeli War?
What year did Martin Luther King Jr. deliver his 'I Have a Dream' speech?
When did South Africa hold its first multiracial democratic elections ending apartheid?
Which year was the Magna Carta reissued with broader royal concessions after initial sealing?
In what year did the Black Tuesday stock market crash that precipitated the Great Depression occur?
What year did the Treaty of Versailles formally end World War I?
When was the Gutenberg Bible completed, marking a milestone in printing history?
Which year did the Spanish conquest of the Aztec Empire culminate with Tenochtitlan's fall?
In what year did the English Bill of Rights become law, shaping constitutional monarchy?
What year did the Louisiana Purchase double the size of the United States?
When did the Chinese Communist Party proclaim the People's Republic of China?
Which year did the Irish Potato Famine, a major demographic catastrophe, begin in earnest?
In what year did the Battle of Stalingrad end, marking a turning point in WWII's Eastern Front?
What year did the first Crusade capture Jerusalem, establishing several Crusader states?
When was the Treaty of Tordesillas, dividing new lands between Spain and Portugal, signed?
Which year did the Bolshevik leader Lenin die, initiating a power struggle in the USSR?
In what year did the Panama Canal officially open for traffic?
What year did Florence Nightingale gain renown for nursing work during the Crimean War?
When did the Ottoman siege and fall of Constantinople lead to the end of the Byzantine Empire?
Which year saw the formation of NATO as a collective defense alliance?
In which year did the British Parliament pass the Reform Act extending the franchise in 19th century Britain?
What year did the Franco-Prussian War end, leading to German unification under the Second Reich?
When did the Spanish Civil War begin, a precursor to broader European conflicts?

hard.question: In what year was the Edict of Milan issued, granting religious toleration to Christians in the Roman Empire?
When did the Great Schism split the Christian Church into Western and Eastern branches?
Which year did the Council of Trent conclude, shaping Catholic Counter-Reformation doctrine?
In what year did the Battle of Tours halt Umayyad expansion into Western Europe?
What year did the Library of Alexandria suffer a major destructive event often dated by historians?
When did Charlemagne get crowned Emperor by the Pope, reviving the Roman imperial title in the West?
Which year marks the completion of the Domesday Book, William the Conqueror's survey of England?
In what year was the Treaty of Westphalia signed, ending the Thirty Years' War?
What year did Hernán Cortés begin his expedition that led to the fall of the Aztec Empire?
When did the Haitian Revolution begin, leading to the world's first Black republic?
Which year did Vasco da Gama reach India by sea, opening a direct Atlantic-Indian route?
In what year did the Glorious Revolution depose James II and bring William and Mary to the throne?
What year did the Voyages of Zheng He reach the East African coast, demonstrating Ming naval reach?
When was the Edict of Caracalla (Constitutio Antoniniana) granting Roman citizenship to many free men?
Which year did the Battle of Lepanto occur, curbing Ottoman naval dominance in the Mediterranean?
In what year was the Code of Justinian compiled, influencing civil law traditions?
What year did the Norman conquest of southern Italy begin with Norman incursions?
When did the Tet Offensive occur, a pivotal series of conflicts in the Vietnam War?
Which year did Ferdinand Magellan's expedition begin the first circumnavigation of the globe?
In what year did the Paris Commune arise as a radical socialist government in the city?
What year did the Taiping Rebellion, one of the deadliest conflicts, begin in China?
When was the Rosetta Stone engraved, enabling the decipherment of Egyptian hieroglyphs after discovery?
Which year did the Anglo-Zanzibar War occur, often cited as the shortest war in history?
In what year did theist philosopher and statesman Thomas More publish Utopia, influencing political thought?
What year did the Glorious Revolution lead to the Bill of Rights in England, shaping parliamentary sovereignty?
When did the Great Fire of Rome take place during Nero's reign, a debated historical event?
Which year did the Tanzimat reforms begin in the Ottoman Empire, modernizing its institutions?
In what year did the Bolsheviks launch the Kronstadt rebellion suppression, consolidating Soviet power?
What year did the Congress of Vienna conclude, reshaping Europe after the Napoleonic Wars?
When did the Sui Dynasty complete the Grand Canal, transforming Chinese internal trade routes?
Which year did Ferdinand and Isabella complete the Reconquista with Granada's fall, ending Muslim rule in Iberia?
In what year did the first self-propelled steam locomotive successfully operate, marking early railway history?
What year did the Act of Supremacy declare the English monarch head of the Church of England?
When was the city of Constantinople formally renamed Istanbul by Turkish authorities?
Which year did the Zanj Rebellion, a major slave uprising in Basra, begin?
In what year did the Stockholm Bloodbath, a mass execution in Scandinavian history, occur?
What year did the Anglo-Powhatan Wars in early colonial Virginia begin, shaping English-Native relations?
When did the Opium War between Britain and Qing China begin, initiating major 19th-century treaties?
Which year did the Spanish reconquest of Granada complete the Christian reconquista of Iberia?
In what year did the Ethiopian victory at Adwa repel Italian colonization attempts?
What year did the Peace of Augsburg permit rulers to choose Lutheranism or Catholicism in the Holy Roman Empire?
When was the first recorded use of gunpowder weapons in European warfare at the Battle of Crécy?
Which year did the Battle of Tours (Poitiers) take place where Charles Martel halted Islamic expansion?
In what year did Constantine I issue the first civil recognition of Christianity in the Roman Empire?
What year did the Periclean building program, including the Parthenon, begin in Athens?
When was the Treaty of Nanking signed, ending the First Opium War and ceding Hong Kong to Britain?
Which year did the Reform Act of 1867 in Britain significantly extend voting rights to urban working men?
In what year did the Great Mutiny (Indian Rebellion) against British rule begin?
What year marks the official start of the Safavid dynasty in Persia under Shah Ismail I?
When did Tokugawa Ieyasu consolidate power at the Battle of Sekigahara, initiating Tokugawa shogunate rule?
Which year did the Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo end the Mexican-American War, ceding territory to the US?
In what year did the First Crusade's avenue of pilgrimage and military campaigns formally begin with Pope Urban II's call?
What year did the Anglo-Saxon Chronicle first begin recording English history under King Alfred?
When did the Dutch capture Malacca from the Portuguese, altering Southeast Asian trade control?
Which year did the Great Irish Rebellion of 1641 begin, affecting British Isles politics and war?
In what year did the Black Hawk War, signaling final Native American resistance in Illinois region, take place?
What year did Belgium gain independence from the Netherlands following the Belgian Revolution?
When was the first edition of Adam Smith's The Wealth of Nations published, influencing economics?
Which year did the Treaty of Kanagawa open Japan to American trade under Commodore Perry?
In what year did the Pilgrims land at Plymouth Rock and establish Plymouth Colony?
What year did the Berlin Conference regulate European colonization of Africa, formalizing the Scramble for Africa?
When did the Dreyfus Affair begin publicly in France, revealing deep institutional antisemitism and divisions?
Which year did the Battle of Midway occur, turning the tide in the Pacific Theater of World War II?
In what year did the Irish Free State formally come into existence following the Anglo-Irish Treaty?
What year did the Salt March conclude when Gandhi reached Dandi, creating international attention?
When was the Ottoman Tanzimat edict Hatt-ı Şerif of Gülhane proclaimed, starting legal reforms?
Which year did the Battle of Hastings occur, leading to Norman rule in England?
In what year did Samuel de Champlain found Quebec City, a cornerstone of French North America?
What year did the French Revolution's Reign of Terror peak with mass executions under the Committee of Public Safety?
